mapper.insert: insert into intermediary (intermediary_name, intermediary_contact, intermediary_contact_tel, area_id, user_id, intermediary_logo_url, intermediary_introduction) values (#{intermediaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intermediaryContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intermediaryContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{area.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{user.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{intermediaryLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{intermediaryIntroduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update intermediary set intermediary_name = #{intermediaryName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intermediary_contact = #{intermediaryContact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intermediary_contact_tel = #{intermediaryContactTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{area.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{user.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, intermediary_logo_url = #{intermediaryLogoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, intermediary_introduction = #{intermediaryIntroduction,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where intermediary_id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from intermediary i LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user u ON i.user_id = u.userid LEFT JOIN area a ON i.area_id = a.id where i.intermediary_id = #{intermediaryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select i.*,u.name uname,u.mobile,u.userid,a.* FROM intermediary i LEFT JOIN area a ON i.area_id = a.id LEFT JOIN dingtalk_user u ON i.user_id = u.userid WHERE 1=1 and i.intermediary_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{intermediaryName},'%') and a.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{area.name},'%') and i.intermediary_contact LIKE CONCAT('%',#{intermediaryContact},'%') and i.intermediary_contact_tel LIKE CONCAT('%',#{intermediaryContactTel},'%')
